item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I’m Alex Weir, a Liberty University student graduating in 2028 with a Bachelor’s in Computer Engineering. I love tech and have basic skills in a reasonably wide range of platforms and technologies, but I have excellent Googling skills and can figure out anything in a pinch. Though I don’t have a degree, I have a number of certifications, and my collection of them is always growing. I’m on the Liberty University Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (CCDC) team, focusing on Linux and network enumeration.
